name: Verify user is able to add details of temperature, alarms and save

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to add details of temperature, alarms and save ({Equipment category=Walk In Freezer, Supplier=Haier, Equipment Type/Model=VLS 354A AC, Status=Functional})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
Click login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English
Then User login as "Store Operator"
User login: Store Operator
And User click on "Apply" button
Click on button: Apply
Given User click on "Store Data" tab
Click on tab: Store Data
When User click on "Add" button
Click on button: Add
Then "Add new storage data" heading is visible
Validate is heading visible: Add new storage data
And User select "Walk In Freezer" from "Equipment category" in "Store Data" tab
Select value from dropdown store data: Walk In Freezer, Equipment category
And User select "Haier" from "Supplier" in "Store Data" tab
Select value from dropdown store data: Haier, Supplier
And User select "VLS 354A AC" from "Equipment Type/Model" in "Store Data" tab
Select value from dropdown store data: VLS 354A AC, Equipment Type/Model
And User enter random text in "equipmentName"
Enter random text: equipmentName
Generate randomtext
And User select "Functional" from "Status" in "Store Data" tab
Select value from dropdown store data: Functional, Status
When User click on "Create" button
Click on button: Create
Then Storage Data is created successfully
Validate created message displayed
And Storage Data is visible in storage data table to user
And User click on "Temp Logging" tab
Click on tab: Temp Logging
When User click on "Edit" button in templogging tab
Click on edit temperature button: Edit
And User wait for "1" seconds
And User enter "valid" temperature details in table
Enter valid details in table
And User click on "Save" button in templogging tab
Click on save temperature button: Save
Then Temperature logging data is created successfully
Validate created message displayed
And User wait for "10" seconds
And Temperature and alarm data is visible in table
Validate details in table

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User click on "Store Data" tab
When User click on "Add" button
Then "Add new storage data" heading is visible
And User select "<Equipment category>" from "Equipment category" in "Store Data" tab
And User select "<Supplier>" from "Supplier" in "Store Data" tab
And User select "<Equipment Type/Model>" from "Equipment Type/Model" in "Store Data" tab
And User enter random text in "equipmentName"
And User select "<Status>" from "Status" in "Store Data" tab
When User click on "Create" button
Then Storage Data is created successfully
And Storage Data is visible in storage data table to user
And User click on "Temp Logging" tab
When User click on "Edit" button in templogging tab
And User wait for "1" seconds
And User enter "valid" temperature details in table
And User click on "Save" button in templogging tab
Then Temperature logging data is created successfully
And User wait for "10" seconds
And Temperature and alarm data is visible in table
